amendment.description: An amendment numbered 38 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16 to require states to seek to ensure that any voting machine used for the purposes of a federal election, by 2022, is manufactured in the United States.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pocan amendment (A035) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A035) offered by Mr. Pocan.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Pocan amendment (A035) Agreed to by voice vote.
